feed.title: Music Service Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Music Service: 2024.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump yt-dlp from 2024.07.09 to 2024.9.27 by @dependabot in https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/pull/105
  • Bump flask-migrate from 4.0.5 to 4.0.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/pull/101
  • Bump schedule from 1.2.1 to 1.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/pull/100
  • Bump flask from 3.0.0 to 3.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/pull/98
  • Release/2024.11 by @thijstakken in https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/pull/106

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/pull/105

Full Changelog: https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/compare/2024.7...2024.11

entry.title: New release for Music Service: 2025.2
entry.content:
Last week the Music Service was listed in the selfh.st newsletter!

Thanks to this, there are many new stargazers, thank you all for checking out this project! Your feedback is highly appreciated!

What's Changed

  • added vectorized logo by @thijstakken in https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/pull/132
  • removed owner realtion in GUI by @thijstakken in https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/pull/133
  • Bump python-dotenv from 1.0.0 to 1.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/pull/97
  • Bump yt-dlp from 2024.12.23 to 2025.1.26 by @dependabot in https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/pull/131
  • Bump flask-migrate from 4.0.7 to 4.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/pull/129

Full Changelog: https://github.com/thijstakken/MusicService/compare/2025.1...2025.2
